name: ixalan_supersized
description: Comprehensive Ixalan + Rivals of Ixalan mechanics: Dinosaurs (Enrage), Merfolk (+1/+1 counters & explore), Pirates (Raid & Treasures), Vampires (lifelink & go-wide), Vehicles (crew), Transforming double-faced quests, Ascend (city's blessing).

Creature: Raid — Whenever {CARD_NICK} enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

Ascend {ASCEND_REMINDER}
As long as you have the city's blessing, {CARD_NICK} gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.
When {CARD_NICK} enters the battlefield, {EXPLORE_ACTION}. If a +1/+1 counter is put on it this way, you gain 2 life.
Instant: {RAID_COND} creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Create a Treasure token.
Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn. If it’s a Vampire, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Exile target tapped creature. If you have the city's blessing, create a Treasure token.
{RAID_COND} exile target artifact or enchantment. Create a 1/1 Vampire with lifelink.
Sorcery:
Ascend {ASCEND_REMINDER}
Create two 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink. {ASCEND_PAYOFF}
Enchantment: At the beginning of your end step, if you gained life this turn, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

Ascend {ASCEND_REMINDER}
Creatures you control get +1/+1. As long as you have the city's blessing, they also have vigilance.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Whenever it attacks, create a Treasure token. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Land:
This land enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
{W},{T}: Target Vampire you control gains lifelink until end of turn.

Creature: When {CARD_NICK} enters the battlefield, {EXPLORE_ACTION}. If a card was put into your graveyard this way, draw a card then discard a card.
Whenever {CARD_NICK} deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token.

Ascend {ASCEND_REMINDER}
As long as you have the city's blessing, Merfolk you control have hexproof.
Instant: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {NUM_MED}. If you attacked this turn, instead counter that spell unless its controller pays {NUM_LARGE}.
Return target creature to its owner's hand. {TREASURE_CLAUSE}
Target creature explores. If it puts a +1/+1 counter on itself this way, untap it.
Sorcery: Draw two cards. If you attacked with a Pirate this turn, create a Treasure token.
Enchantment: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0 as long as you have the city's blessing.
Whenever you create one or more Treasure tokens, scry 1, then draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
Whenever a Merfolk you control deals combat damage to a player, {EXPLORE_ACTION}.
Artifact:
Vehicle — Crew {CREW_COST}
Whenever this Vehicle deals combat damage to a player, draw a card and create a Treasure token.
Land:
This land enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
{U},{T}: Target Merfolk gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked this turn.

Creature: {ENRAGE_INTRO} each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Whenever another Vampire you control enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token.

Ascend {ASCEND_REMINDER}
As long as you have the city's blessing, {CARD_NICK} gets +2/+2 and has menace.
Instant: {RAID_COND} destroy target creature. Create a Treasure token.
Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. If you sacrificed a Treasure this turn, that creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn instead.
Sorcery: Create two 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink, then each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

Ascend {ASCEND_REMINDER}
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. {ASCEND_PAYOFF}
Raid — If you attacked this turn, destroy target creature. Otherwise, {TREASURE_CLAUSE}
Enchantment: Whenever you sacrifice a Treasure, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Whenever you sacrifice a Treasure, target opponent loses 1 life and you scry 1.
AuraCreature: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Sacrifice a Treasure: Regenerate this creature."
Land:
This land enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
{B},{T}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Draw a card and lose 1 life.

Creature: Raid — When {CARD_NICK} enters the battlefield, it deals {PINGS} to any target.
Whenever {CARD_NICK} attacks, create a Treasure token.
Instant: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. If it's a Pirate, it also gains menace until end of turn.
Sorcery: Create {NUM_MED} Treasure tokens, then you may sacrifice any number of Treasures. For each Treasure sacrificed this way, {CARD_NICK} deals 1 damage to any target.
Enchantment: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you sacrificed a Treasure this turn, target creature you control gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
Artifact:
Vehicle — Crew {CREW_COST}
Whenever this Vehicle becomes crewed, it gains first strike until end of turn. Whenever it deals combat damage to a player, {TREASURE_CLAUSE}
Equipment:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0. Whenever it attacks, {TREASURE_CLAUSE}
Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Land:
This land enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
{R},{T}: Target Pirate you control gets +1/+0 and gains menace until end of turn.

Creature:
Ascend {ASCEND_REMINDER}
As long as you have the city's blessing, Dinosaurs you control have trample.
Instant: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If it explored this turn, it also gains trample until end of turn.
Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Create a Treasure token.
Sorcery: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then create a Treasure token.
Target Dinosaur you control fights up to one target creature you don't control. Then {CARD_NICK} deals 1 damage to that Dinosaur.
Enchantment: Whenever a creature you control explores, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
Land:
This land enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
{G},{T}: Target creature you control explores.

Artifact:
When {CARD_NICK} enters the battlefield, scry 1.
{T}: Put a landmark counter on {CARD_NICK}. Then if there are three or more landmark counters on it, {DFLIP_RESULT_LAND}
{T}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Draw a card. When you sacrifice your third Treasure this turn, {DFLIP_RESULT_LAND}
{T}: Add {C}. When you spend this mana to cast a Pirate spell, {TREASURE_CLAUSE}
{T}: Create a Treasure token. Activate only if you attacked with a creature this turn.

Vehicle — Crew {CREW_COST}
Whenever this Vehicle attacks, up to one target creature you control explores.
Enchantment: At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, {DFLIP_RESULT_LAND}

Ascend {ASCEND_REMINDER}
When you get the city's blessing, {DFLIP_RESULT_LAND}
Whenever a Pirate you control deals combat damage to a player, {TREASURE_CLAUSE}
Whenever a Merfolk you control explores, draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever a Vampire you control gains you life, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
Whenever a Dinosaur you control is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target creature an opponent controls.
Creature:
When {CARD_NICK} enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token.
Sacrifice a Treasure: {CARD_NICK} gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
AuraLand:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
Whenever you create a Treasure, untap enchanted land.
Activated: {NUM_MED}: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.
Sacrifice a Treasure: Add one mana of any color. Draw a card. Activate only if you attacked this turn.
Land:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2},{T}: Create a Treasure token. Activate only if you control a Pirate.

{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Draw a card.

ASCEND_REMINDER: (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
RAID_COND: Raid — If you attacked with a creature this turn,
Raid — This spell has an additional effect if you attacked with a creature this turn.
TREASURE_CLAUSE: Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
TREASURE_MULTI: Create {NUM_MED} Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}: Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
TRANSFORM_COND: When you control {NUM_MED} or more artifacts, transform {CARD_NICK}.
When you have {NUM_MED} or more Treasure, transform {CARD_NICK}.
At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked with {NUM_SMALL} or more creatures this turn, transform {CARD_NICK}.
DFLIP_RESULT_LAND: Transform it into a legendary land with "{T}: Add one mana of any color" and "{T}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Draw a card."
Transform it into a land named Treasure Cove with "{T}: Add {C}" and "{T}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Draw a card."
MERFOLK_COUNTERS: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target Merfolk.
Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to {NUM_SMALL} target Merfolk.
DINOSAUR_FIGHT: Target Dinosaur you control fights up to one target creature you don't control.
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Dinosaurs you control gain trample until end of turn.
VAMPIRE_GO_WIDE: Create {NUM_SMALL} 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink.
Vampires you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.
PIRATE_TRICKS: Target creature can't block this turn. Create a Treasure token.
Return target tapped creature to its owner's hand. Scry 1. Create a Treasure token.
EXPLORE_SORCERY: Up to {NUM_SMALL} target creatures you control each explore.
ASCEND_PAYOFF: If you have the city's blessing, draw a card.
If you have the city's blessing, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
If you have the city's blessing, create {NUM_SMALL} Treasure tokens.
AURA_PUMP_VAMPIRE: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has lifelink.
Enchanted Vampire gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.
AURA_MERFOLK_EVASION: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
Enchanted Merfolk gets +2/+2 and has hexproof as long as it's untapped.
